short_summary: Maintenance and repair services for Access Control Systems and associated equipment
description: Services d’entretien et de réparation pour divers systèmes et équipements de contrôle d'accès à la garnison Petawawa
full_summary:
## Maintenance and Repair Services for Access Control Systems
### Tender Announcement

* **Reference Number:** WS3872030580-Doc3937525997
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3872030580
* **Publication Date:** March 27, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** April 21, 2023, 14:00:00 ( Local Time)
* **Amendment Date:** March 29, 2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** (Not Specified)
* **Expected Contract End Date:** June 30, 2026

### Tender Status
The tender for [Maintenance and Repair Services for Access Control Systems](#,Maintenance and Repair Services for Access Control Systems) has been _Cancelled_.

### Business Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids for the provision of [_Maintenance and Repair Services for Access Control Systems_](Maintenances et réparations de systèmes de contrôle d'accès). This contract is to be awarded to a qualified service provider to perform maintenance and repair services for the access control systems and associated equipment at Gatineau, Quebec, Canada.

### Goods and Services Classification (GSIN)
Not applicable
### UNSPSC Code
* 46170000 - Security surveillance and detection systems

### Tender Method
This tender will be conducted through an _Open Bidding Process_. The bidder must meet all the requirements of the contract.

### Language
The information provided in this notice is available in both English and French.
### Trade Agreements
This tender is open to bidders from Canada and the following countries, under the terms of the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) 
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement 

### Postal Address
The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), which is located at
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage 
Gatineau, Quebec 
K1A 0S5, Canada
### Contracting Authority
